FuncDef:
The npcc enable command enables the NPCC function in the interface view.
The undo npcc enable command disables the NPCC function in the interface view. The npcc enable command enables the NPCC function in the interface view. The undo npcc enable command disables the NPCC function in the interface view. By default, the NPCC function is disabled on an interface. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,50GE interface view,Interface group view
ExtraInfo: After the lossless queues for which the NPCC function is to be enabled are specified globally, you need to enable the NPCC function in the interface view to implement the NPCC function for IPv4 traffic.
